The story was quickly picked up by the Washington Post, All Headline News and other news agencies eager to report on the Academy Award-winning actress' foray into the musical world. sentence1: Pole Robert Kubica became the highlight of the weekend by winning the pole, but was slow off the start and finished third on the podium. Heikki Kovalainen came fifth and became the only McLaren driver to finish in the points. Timo Glock (Toyota) was engaged in a hard battle with Fernando Alonso (Renault) and came 9th ahead of the Spanish 2005 F1 Champion.

sentence1: A new study conducted by researchers from University of Otago's Christchurch School of Medicine has found that certain chemical compounds naturally found in cruciferous vegetables help kill cancer cells that are particularly resistant to chemotherapy.
